text: Ville Virtanen (born July 17, 1975), better known by his stage name Darude (/dəˈruːd/), is a Finnish DJ and record producer from Eura, Finland. He started making music in 1995 and released the platinum-selling hit single "Sandstorm" in late 1999. Darude represented Finland in Eurovision 2019. == Albums == *2000: Before the Storm FIN #1 *2003: Rush FIN #4 *2007: Label This! *2011: Salmiakki Sessions Vol. 1 *2015: Moments ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish musicians
title: Darude
